javadoc: Command for analyzing the Stack; the command is run in the background.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new command for analyzing the Stack.

params.name: entries
params.comment:
and address set indicating the entry points of functions that have 
 stacks to be analyzed.

params.name: forceProcessing
params.comment:
flag to force processing of stack references even if the stack
           has already been defined.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Constructs a new command for analyzing the Stack.

params.name: entry
params.comment:
the entry point of the function that contains the stack to
           be analyzed.

params.name: forceProcessing
params.comment:
flag to force processing of stack references even if the stack
           has already been defined.

methods.name: analyzeFunction
methods.comment: Analyze a function to build a stack frame based on stack references.

params.name: entry
params.comment: The address of the entry point for the new function

params.name: monitor
params.comment:
the task monitor that is checked to see if the command has
 been cancelled.

throws.comment: if the user canceled this command

methods.name: createStackPointerVariables
methods.comment:
Create locals and parameters based on references involving purely the stack pointer.
 Pushes, Pops, and arithmetic manipulation of the stack pointer must be tracked.

params.name: func
params.comment: - function to analyze stack pointer references

methods.name: replaceInputVarnodes
methods.comment: Replace all occurrences of vn within exp with value

params.name: exp
params.comment: expression within which vn should be replaced with value

params.name: vn
params.comment: a simple varnode to be replaced (e.g., register), must not be a VarnodeOperation

params.name: value
params.comment: replacement value (e.g., constant varnode), must not be a VarnodeOperation

params.name: maxComplexity
params.comment: maximum expression complexity (i.e., depth) allowed for exp

return.comment: updated expression or null if maxComplexity exceeded

name: FunctionResultStateStackAnalysisCmd
comment: Command for analyzing the Stack; the command is run in the background.
